participant_1.background:
I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time.
i m almost finished with my degree.
I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.
I am quite short, only five foot four.
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.

content.text: Hi! I am not sure what to do today. What are you up to?
Hello! I am currently eating breakfast and getting ready for a run. What about you?
I am going to go for a run later today. I am just finishing up my degree and I am trying to get some exercise in before my classes start back up.
That sounds like a great plan! I am a stay at home mom, so I like to get my run in early so I can be home with my daughter when she wakes up.
That sounds amazing! I love kids, but I am not sure if I am ready for one yet. I am going to go visit my family today. I am not too close with them, but I am hoping to change that.
That is great! I love spending time with my family. I hope you have a good time!
Thank you! I am sure I will. I am excited to see my old trophy case. I used to be on the track team in high school.
That is so cool! I used to play soccer in high school. I miss it sometimes.
I miss it too. I used to love the feeling of running and competing.
Me too! I hope you have a great day!
